attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a tax payer we believe that the expenses of MP's are out of context of modern day living . This in turn is putting a burden on all UK tax paying hard working person's.The people of the UK need change in policy and the legal system  to ensure that tax payers money is controlled and expenditure is spent on the essentials of economic and modern day living for the tax paying citizen's of the UK

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
